message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your last offer, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $100. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $107.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $102 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $102. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $109.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a price of $105 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $105. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $112.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our negotiations, I believe we can reach an agreement. I would like to propose a final price of $108 for the product.
